mapper.insert:
insert into rducm_gitlab_member_audit_record (organization_id, project_id, repository_id, user_id, access_level, expires_at, gl_project_id, gl_user_id, gl_access_level, gl_expires_at) values
(#{item.organizationId}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.repositoryId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.accessLevel}, #{item.expiresAt}, #{item.glProjectId}, #{item.glUserId}, #{item.glAccessLevel}, #{item.glExpiresAt})
